official_title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide Federal minimum standards for health insurance for the elderly.
short_title: Senior Citizens Health Insurance Standards Act of 1989

summary.text: Senior Citizens Health Insurance Standards Act of 1989 - Directs each State to submit to the Secretary of Health and Human Services a plan specifying certain minimum standards applicable to the sale of health insurance to the elderly.

titles.title: Senior Citizens Health Insurance Standards Act of 1989
To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to provide Federal minimum standards for health insurance for the elderly.
